Name: Create Program Daily Usage
Description: Create program daily usage records

Name: Create Hardware Utilization
Description: Create hardware utilization records alongside the daily usage

Name: Start Date
Description: Start date for usage creation (i.e. mm/dd/yyyy)

Name: End Date
Description: End date for usage creation (i.e. mm/dd/yyyy)

Name: Usage Plan 1 Percentage
Description: Percentage of increasing usage + increasing mouse clicks

Name: Usage Plan 2 Percentage
Description: Percentage of increasing usage + increasing mouse clicks but flatten out

Name: Usage Plan 2 Flatten Percentage
Description: Percentage of data range where the usage flattens out for plan 2

Name: Usage Plan 3 Percentage
Description: Percentage of increasing usage by interactions stay low (read-only)

Name: Usage Plan 4 Percentage
Description: Percentage of decreating usage and decreasing  mouse clicks

Name: Light Usage Percentage
Description: Percentage of users contributing to light usage (i.e. 5)

Name: Medium Usage Percentage
Description: Percentage of users contributing to medium usage (i.e. 40)

Name: Heavy Usage Percentage
Description: Percentage of users contributing to heavy usage (i.e. 40)

Name: No Usage Percentage
Description: Percentage of users contributing no usage (i.e. 15)

Name: Light Usage Min Minutes
Description: Light usage minimum minutes value per day

Name: Light Usage Max Minutes
Description: Light usage maximum minutes value per  day

Name: Medium Usage Min Minutes
Description: Medium usage minimum minutes value per  day

Name: Medium Usage Max Minutes
Description: Medium usage maximum minutes value per  day

Name: Heavy Usage Min Minutes
Description: Heavy usage minimum minutes value per  day

Name: Heavy Usage Max Minutes
Description: Heavy usage maximum minutes value per  day

Name: Light Usage Min Keystrokes
Description: Light usage minimum keystrokes value

Name: Light Usage Max Keystrokes
Description: Light usage maximum keystrokes value

Name: Medium Usage Min Keystrokes
Description: Medium usage minimum keystrokes value

Name: Medium Usage Max Keystrokes
Description: Medium usage maximum keystrokes value

Name: Heavy Usage Min Keystrokes
Description: Light usage minimum keystrokes value

Name: Heavy Usage Max Keystrokes
Description: Light usage maximum keystrokes value

Name: Light Usage Min Mouseclicks
Description: Light usage minimum mouse clicks value

Name: Light Usage Max Mouseclicks
Description: Light usage maximum mouse clicks value

Name: Medium Usage Min Mouseclicks
Description: Medium usage minimum mouse clicks value

Name: Medium Usage Max Mouseclicks
Description: Medium usage maximum mouse clicks value

Name: Heavy Usage Min Mouseclicks
Description: Heavy usage minimum mouse clicks value

Name: Heavy Usage Max Mouseclicks
Description: Heavy usage maximum mouse clicks value

Name: Exclude Weekends
Description: Do not generate usage on weekends (true or false)

Name: Minimum Times Started
Description: Minimum number of times started value (i.e. 1)

Name: Maximum Times Started
Description: Maximum number of times started value (i.e. 10)

Name: Start Hour
Description: Hour of the day where usage begins (0-23)

Name: End Hour
Description: Hour of the day where usage ends (0-23)

Name: Device Utilization CPU Min
Description: Device resource utilization minimum CPU

Name: Device Utilization CPU Max
Description: Device resource utilization maximum CPU

Name: Device Utilization Mem Max
Description: Device resource utilization minimum memory

Name: Device Utilization Mem Max
Description: Device resource utilization maximum memory
